title: [Large-Scale] Mobile-Based Online Lecture Design and Evaluation Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic principles of online course design and the use of mobile learning tools
context.additional_context: The need to develop online course design and evaluation competencies using evidence-based standards and peer review in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can design a 5-minute mobile-friendly lecture module by applying the core principles of the QM (Quality Matters) standards framework.
Learners can analyze the quality of a peerâ€™s online course design using a 3-level evaluation scale with a peer review checklist.
Learners can design three interaction strategies applicable to mobile learning environments and derive at least two learning effectiveness measurement indicators.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
